bug.author: alalek
bug.summary: DNN: async test hangs with DLIE
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:http://pullrequest.opencv.org/buildbot/builders/3_4_openvino-opencl-skx-lin64/builds/278>Python build</denchmark-link> : <denchmark-code>test_async (test_dnn.dnn_test) ...
DLIE/CPU
command timed out: 600 seconds without output </denchmark-code>
relates <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/pull/13694>#13694</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Problem is <denchmark-link:http://pullrequest.opencv.org/buildbot/builders/3_4_openvino-opencl-skx-lin64/builds/285/steps/test_python3-opencl/logs/stdio>still</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:http://pullrequest.opencv.org/buildbot/builders/3_4_openvino-skx-lin64/builds/286/steps/test_python2/logs/stdio>here</denchmark-link> . Lets see if <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/pull/14440>#14440</denchmark-link> helps.
